translations: vt.用唱片录制；用唱机播放

sentences.sentence: It was one of those old-fashioned gramophones that winds up.
sentences.translation: 那是一台上弦的老式留声机。

sentences.sentence: Even in private houses, Latin American music was played for the tango, as more and more people owned gramophones.
sentences.translation: 甚至私下在家中，越来越多拥有留声机的人用拉美音乐为探戈伴奏。
